name: Funny Physics Game Thing
description: This project is my dream game, so I will try to complete it this time. The game is most likely going to be a physics-based RPG or roguelike of some sort. Think the physics of TABS, the combat of Mordhau, and a world like Skyrim all combined into a terrible mess of an indie game with a budget of pretty much $0. Don't expect much for a while :|
